name: Request by director of finance for report of previously unreported information
text: [§523A-54]  Request by director of finance for report of previously unreported information.  On the thirtieth day of June of each year, the director shall request the Comptroller General or other proper officer of the United States to report all previously unreported information relating to unclaimed property as determined by that officer pursuant to federal law. [L 1988, c 93, pt of §2]
